name: Lleech
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Slayer slays the Lleech host, the host dies.
If the Mastermind is alive and the Lleech host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.
